title: Lost
lyrics:
I saw the reasons and I saw the signs
I know the way this time
I saw the map and I know just what it said
And I'm gonna tell you so you understand
I know the way this time

I know the way this time

We won't get lost

So lost

Lost

So Lost



And I saw the river

And I saw the ships

And I took a little look into the abyss

And I saw the reasons

And I saw the signs

And I know the way this time



I know the way this time

I know the way this time

We won't get lost

So lost

Lost

So Lost
